extension.name: Finch - Canonical URLs
extension.author: Jason Lowry
extension.description: Choose a language to be the canonical link to reduce duplicate content.

field.name: catids
field.label: Select a category
field.description: Select the categories that you want to canonicalize

field.name: domain
field.label: Enter a domain (optional)
field.description: Enter a domain that you want to canonicalize with http:// or https:// - otherwize leave blank

field.name: canonical_lang
field.label: Select the canonical language
field.query: select lang_code, title_native from #__languages where published=1;
